sentences.english: This image is then projected on the film of a streak camera .
sentences.chinese: 这个影象被投射到一个扫描摄影机的胶片上。

sentences.english: I use flashcards to remember new English words.
sentences.chinese: 使用有图有字的闪卡影象生字。

sentences.english: Leg-length discrepancy was assessed clinically and radiographically when needed.
sentences.chinese: 在需要时，从临床上和影象学上对肢体长度进行评定。

sentences.english: Between these two images she wavered, hesitating which to believe.
sentences.chinese: 她在这两个影象之间摇摆不定，不知道该相信哪个好。

sentences.english: The patient's high fever deleted most of his memories.
sentences.chinese: 病人的高烧使他的影象丧失净尽。

sentences.english: AIM To study the diagnostic value of the imaging in the negative ureteral calculous.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨输尿管阴性结石的影象学诊断价值。

sentences.english: Like meaningfulness and organization, visualization is also helpful to memory.
sentences.chinese: 如同意义战构造，念像也有助于影象。

sentences.english: This includes audio and visual material such as tapes , film or video recordings.
sentences.chinese: 这包括音频和视频的材料例如磁带，胶卷或影象记录。

sentences.english: Fresh The party was fresh in her memory.
sentences.chinese: 那次聚会在他脑海里影象犹新。

sentences.english: The second chapter studies the transformation from the text to image of Strange Tales of a Lonely Studio.
sentences.chinese: 第二章重点研究《聊斋志异》从文字到影象的转换。

sentences.english: The heaviest of burdens is simultaneously an image of life's most intense fullfillment.
sentences.chinese: 最沉重的负担同时也成了最强生命力的影象。

sentences.english: I was swimming soul, full avenue for the migration of finding that warm memories.
sentences.chinese: 我是游魂，满大街的游走只为找到那温存的影象。

sentences.english: Mustangs are an after image of the west, no better than ghosts, hardly there at all.
sentences.chinese: 而野马就是西部残留影象，犹如鬼魅，几乎不见踪影。

sentences.english: The mechanism by which minds store memories is not clearly understood.
sentences.chinese: 大脑细胞贮存影象郭德纲机理并不为情不自禁了了。

sentences.english: He was asked to set down the facts just as he remembered them.
sentences.chinese: 他被要求依据影象把现实写上去。

definition: variant of 圖像|图像[tu2 xiang4]
